module.name: Phonebook
module.description: Provides a phonebook which can be used as base for Caller ID Lookup and Speed Dial
module.changelog: *13.0.6.5* FREEPBX-20063 *13.0.6.4* Fixing FREEPBX-19622 *13.0.6.3* FREEPBX-18900 Phonebook entries starting in E.164-format can't be deleted *13.0.6.2* FREEPBX-16571 - Fix issue with importing an export *13.0.6* FREEPBX-16508, FREEPBX-16571 *13.0.5.8* FREEPBX-15964 dont enforce speeddial if users dont want it *13.0.5.7* FREEPBX-15113 *13.0.5.6* FREEPBX-15113 FREEPBX-15114 *13.0.5.5* FREEPBX-12967 *13.0.5.4* FREEPBX-12366 default name if not provided *13.0.5.3* FREEPBX-6743 Make columns sortable *13.0.5.2* FREEPBX-10514 update validation *13.0.5.1* validate parameter *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10356 Fix form validation *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9646 address issues and publish *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *2.11.0.2* include license file *2.11.0.1* #5792 again *2.11.0.0* #5792 *2.10.0.2* exit, not die_freepbx *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* #5355 *2.9.0.2* spelling, localizations *2.9.0.1* set reposoitory *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update *2.8.0.1* #4590 *2.8.0.0* #4309 *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.0.2* localization changes, Swedish *2.5.0.1* #3009 spelling *2.5.0* #1821, #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.1* #2843 Russian Translation *2.4.0* CHANGELOG TRUNCATED See SVN Repository
